verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: will] not meet with North Korean Leader Kim Jong Un in Singapore next month , White House officials announced Thursday .

[ARG0: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-MOD: will] [ARGM-NEG: not] [V: meet] [ARG1: with North Korean Leader Kim Jong Un] [ARGM-LOC: in Singapore] [ARGM-TMP: next month] , White House officials announced Thursday .
[ARG1: President Donald Trump will not meet with North Korean Leader Kim Jong Un in Singapore next month] , [ARG0: White House officials] [V: announced] [ARGM-TMP: Thursday] .
